name: Vegan Whipped Cream (NO coconut!)
description: Easy Vegan Whipped Cream with NO coconut! This might be the healthiest and fluffiest whipped topping on the planet. 5 minutes is all you need!

video.name: Vegan Whipped Cream
video.description: Easy Vegan Whipped Cream with NO coconut! This might be the healthiest and fluffiest whipped topping on the planet. 5 minutes is all you need to make it!

recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup aquafaba (liquid from 1 can of chickpeas)

recipeInstructions.text: Drain the liquid from a can of chickpeas into a large bowl. Reserve the chickpeas for another use. You should have about 1/2 cup of liquid, but it doesn't have to be exact; a little more or a little less is fine.
recipeInstructions.name: Drain the liquid from a can of chickpeas into a large bowl. Reserve the chickpeas for another use. You should have about 1/2 cup of liquid, but it doesn't have to be exact; a little more or a little less is fine.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the cream of tartar; this helps with the whipping process. With a hand mixer, start mixing on medium speed. Once it gets a little foamy, increase the speed to high and beat for about 3-4 minutes, until stiff peaks form.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the cream of tartar; this helps with the whipping process. With a hand mixer, start mixing on medium speed. Once it gets a little foamy, increase the speed to high and beat for about 3-4 minutes, until stiff peaks form.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the powdered sugar and vanilla and continue to beat about 1 more minute, until fluffy and smooth. That's it!
recipeInstructions.name: Add the powdered sugar and vanilla and continue to beat about 1 more minute, until fluffy and smooth. That's it!

recipeInstructions.text: Serve immediately for best results. Store leftover whipped cream in the freezer, it won't hold up as well in the refrigerator. It reminds me a lot of cool whip straight from the freezer!
recipeInstructions.name: Serve immediately for best results. Store leftover whipped cream in the freezer, it won't hold up as well in the refrigerator. It reminds me a lot of cool whip straight from the freezer!

keywords: aquafaba whipped cream, vegan whipped cream
